CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ( Physical_Decommsion_Date_from_Source_Sys__c - TODAY()) > 180 , ( Physical_Decommsion_Date_from_Source_Sys__c - TODAY()) < 210), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Box is checked if the forecasted Physical Decom date is less than 210 days away and more than 180 days away. Warns that a site is approaching Physical Shutdown Locking date.
CustomField.label: 180 Day Physical Shutdown Warning
